greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest number m such that gcd(m,EKG(m)) = n, where EKG = A064413, the EKG sequence.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..206
program: f x z m | member x m = m ! x : f (x + 1) (x + 1) m
| member y m = f x (z + 1) m
| otherwise  = f x (z + 1) (insert y z m)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 16 2014
